participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Alex enjoys spending time alone in her imagination, often through roleplaying games and music.
participant_1.background: i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home.

participant_2.name: Marco
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music and languages, Marco loves to engage in cultural exchanges and share his knowledge.
participant_2.background: one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish. i am a musician. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. i also study languages. my next language to study is french.

content.text: This is all Elven to me.
I do but I have no time now that I care for my grandparents.
i am learning spanish. do you speak spanish?
I do not speak English, but I do not have a job
Cool. What do you do for a living?
I like music, but I like music
